tool_description: Analyzes and validates bathroom room dimensions, calculates usable space, and identifies structural constraints like windows, doors, and immovable elements.

window_locations.description: Window positions as wall names (north, south, east, west)

error_messages: Invalid room dimensions: Room length and width must be between 3 and 20 feet, ceiling height between 7 and 12 feet.
Door width out of range: Door width must be between 24 and 48 inches.
Invalid window location: Use cardinal directions (north, south, east, west) for window positions.
usage: Input room measurements and structural features. The tool calculates usable floor space and identifies constraints for fixture placement.

total_floor_area.description: Total room floor area in square feet

usable_floor_area.description: Available floor area excluding door swing and structural constraints

constraint_zones.description: Areas unavailable for fixture placement due to doors, windows, or structural elements

room_classification.description: Size category: compact, standard, or spacious
